meanings.definition: To organize into a labor union.
meanings.sent1: The workers unionizes to demand fair wages.
meanings.sent2: She unionizes with her colleagues for better working conditions.
meanings.sent3: The penguins unionizes to negotiate for more fish.
meanings.sent4: The trees unionizes to stand strong against the storm.
meanings.sent5: The students unionizes to advocate for educational reforms.

meanings.definition: To join or become a member of a labor union.
meanings.sent1: He unionizes to support collective bargaining.
meanings.sent2: They unionizes to have a stronger voice in the workplace.
meanings.sent3: The cats unionizes to demand more treats in the break room.
meanings.sent4: The stars unionizes to shine brighter together in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: She unionizes to stand in solidarity with her fellow workers.
